english.segment1: Father he raised us in the grace of god. Jeep wagoneer and blue grass songs. He showed us all the things a proper father would. And even more than the best of fathers do
english.segment2: So father here is a song. That i'm singing. And i'd be blessed if you'd just sing along. Pop i've seen for, what i've seen of all the fathers in this world. They're not as great as my old man
english.segment3: So father here is a song that i'm singing. And i'd be blessed if you'd just sing along. Pop i've seen for, what i've seen of all the fathers in this world. They're not as great as my old man
